Library videos

Library shorts

Library Shorts is a series of short animations that follow OU student Bob (and his goldfish Fin) as he explores the range of library resources and services that will support him and other OU students during their studies.

An introduction to Library Services for postgraduate students

Find out more about how the OU Library supports postgraduate students during their studies.

Going mobile with Library Services

Bob discovers how using his mobile to access the online library can help him study on the go.

Being digital: developing essential skills for study, work and life online

Bob discovers "Being digital", a collection of short interactive activities which help him develop essential skills for study, work and life online.

Avoiding plagiarism

Bob discovers how the library can help him avoid plagiarism by referencing the information sources he uses.

Online training sessions: What are they?

Bob discovers the range of online training sessions offered by Library Services.

What is the online library?

Bob discovers the vast range of resources available through the online library, as well as some introductory guides and tutorials that will help him use them.

Searching with One Stop Search

As Bob struggles to find and access journal articles, his tutor tells him about a search tool on the Library website that will let him search across a range of online journals.

Introducing MyReferences

Bob finds out that he has access to a new online tool that will help him record the lists of resources he has used and create reference lists in the right format for his module.

Library demos

Library demos are a series of short and simple how-to videos, helping OU students with resources and services that will support them during their studies.

How to access a resource via Athens

This short how-to video will assist OU students with navigating extra links when logging in to Athens authenticated online resources.
